Document.DocumentDescription: The Business Case for a project is the rationale behind the initiation of a new building project. It may consist solely of a reasoned argument. It may contain supporting information, financial appraisals or other background information. It should also highlight initial considerations for the Project Outcomes. In summary, it is a combination of objective and subjective considerations. The Business Case might be prepared in relation to, for example, appraising a number of sites or in relation to assessing a refurbishment against a new build option.
Document.DocumentName: 0.010 Identify Business Case requirements.

Document.DocumentDescription: The brief prepared to enable the Strategic Definition of the project. Strategic considerations might include considering different sites, whether to extend, refurbish or build new and the key Project Outcomes as well as initial considerations for the Project Programme and assembling the project team.
Document.DocumentName: 0.020 Identify Strategic Brief.

Document.DocumentDescription: The Core Project Requirements include any specific Project Outcomes and Project Objectives essential for the successful completion of the project
Document.DocumentName: 0.030 Identify Core Project Requirements.

Document.DocumentDescription: All members of the Project Team will have an input, but one member takes responsibilty for organising the process and coordinating the results.
Document.DocumentName: 0.040 Collate comments and facilitate workshops to discuss Business Case and develop Strategic Brief with Project Team members

Document.DocumentDescription: The Project Team must be appropriate to the nature and scale of the project, and the agreed method of delivery of the Core Objectives.
Document.DocumentName: 0.050 Discuss initial considerations for assembling the Project Team

Document.DocumentDescription: The overall period for the briefing, design, construction and postcompletion activities of a project
Document.DocumentName: 0.060 Establish Project Programme

Document.DocumentDescription: All members of the Project Team will have an input, but one member takes responsibilty for organising the process and coordinating the results.
Document.DocumentName: 0.070 Collate Feedback from previous projects

Document.DocumentDescription: All members of the Project Team will have an input, but one member takes responsibilty for organising the process and coordinating the results.
Document.DocumentName: 0.080 Contribute to preparation of Strategic Brief

Document.DocumentName: 0.090 Comment on project Programme

Document.DocumentDescription: Cost information will depend on the Core Project Requirements and may include development costs, facilitating work, construction and whole life costs, as well as an assessment of non - financial factors, such as environmental impacts.
Document.DocumentName: 0.180 Contribute Cost Information to preparation of Strategic Brief

Document.DocumentDescription: This will establish how well the Strategic Brief meets the Business Case and the Core Project Requirements. Actual testing will vary depending on particular circumstancesof the project
Document.DocumentName: 0.190 Test the robustness of the Strategic Brief

Document.DocumentDescription: All members of the Project Team will have an input, but one member takes responsibilty for organising the process and coordinating the results.
Document.DocumentName: 0.200 Review feedback from previous projects

Document.DocumentDescription: Ensure that a strategic sustainability review of client needs and potential sites has been carried out, including reuse of existing facilities, building components or materials. The precise nature of the review will depend on the definition and method chosen for measuring sustainabilty.
Document.DocumentName: 0.210 Ensure that a strategic sustainability review of client needs and potential sites has been carried out, including reuse of existing facilities, building components or materials.

Document.DocumentDescription: Methods and protocol for information exchange will depend on the nature and complexity of the project.
Document.DocumentName: 0.220 Strategic Brief Information Exchange
